statements: SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, doctor_id, medication_name, dosage, schedule, start_date, end_date FROM prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND dosage = 100.5
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50.0 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions FROM prescriptions WHERE schedule = 'Morning'
SELECT doctor_id, SUM(dosage) AS total_dosage FROM prescriptions GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING total_dosage > 500.0
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS prescriptions_count FROM prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name ORDER BY prescriptions_count DESC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, last_visit FROM patients ORDER BY last_visit DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Once a day' AND doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, start_date, end_date FROM prescriptions WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Johnson';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, last_visit FROM patients ORDER BY last_visit DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE prescriptions.medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, doctor_name FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE prescriptions.start_date between '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM patients JOIN medication_prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = medication_prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, prescription_date FROM patients JOIN medication_prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = medication_prescriptions.patient_id WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name, prescription_date FROM medication_prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM prescription_history WHERE fulfillment_status IN ('Completed', 'Cancelled') ORDER BY fulfillment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE medication_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, start_date, end_date FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_id = 2;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, start_date, end_date FROM prescriptions WHERE end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE medication_name LIKE '%pain%' ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage BETWEEN 10 AND 20 AND frequency = 'Twice a day';
SELECT * FROM Patients LIMIT 10
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, doctor_id FROM Prescriptions WHERE doctor_id = 5
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage_instructions FROM Medications WHERE medication_id = 10
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01'
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage_instructions FROM Medications WHERE medication_id = 1
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, doctor_id, prescription_date FROM Prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 100 AND doctor_id = 200 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, adherence_date, adherence_status FROM AdherenceTracking WHERE adherence_status = 'Missed'
